Question: This person collaborated with others to produce a model of a wormhole.
Hints: On 11 November 1930, U.S Patent 1,781,541 was awarded to this person and Leó Szilárd for the refrigerator.
In 1917, this person applied the General theory of relativity to model the structure of the universe as a whole.
In the ____ model, each atom oscillates independently – a series of equally spaced quantized states for each oscillator.
